location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.4976 of 1852 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Acknowledging receipt of Kemball's previous letter (f 147), and adding that the Right Honourable Governor in Council approves of the letter sent to Sheikh Sultan bin Saqr, ruler of Ra's al-Khaymah.
